about_the_game:
Time cycle mystery story

■Story

In the near future, a sudden plague sweeps the world, causing the loss of countless lives and the collapse of society. Humanity's survival is at stake, and the global order is falling apart. You are a scientist dedicated to developing vaccines, and you work with three companions to fight for the future of mankind.

However, as the vaccine is completed, you discover that there is more than meets the eye. The laughter at the celebration banquet hides unsolved mysteries, and every toast may be the starting point of reincarnation. The fate of each character is intertwined, and the power of time reincarnation gradually reveals the truth.

■Concept

This game about endless reincarnation!

Collect clues in each reincarnation to reach the truth!

At the same time, I recall the enthusiastic exchanges with other researchers!

■Game features

With the plague as the background, it is a plot experience full of tension and suspense.

Explore the bonds between characters and find opportunities for salvation in the repetitive time.

There are 11 types of erotic events (including endings)

Choose the protagonist's actions and explore the laboratory!

Reminiscing about the house

content_descriptors.notes: contains scenes of nudity, sexual violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex. The characters in the play are all over 20 years old.

name: The same day~Never-ending celebration party~

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: 同一天~永無止境的慶功宴~ - $7.99

package_groups.title: Buy The same day~Never-ending celebration party~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In the near future, a global plague devastates society. As a scientist working with three companions to develop a vaccine, you uncover hidden mysteries. Each toast in celebration may trigger a new time loop, intertwining your fates as the truth behind this endless cycle gradually comes to light.
